message:
SYSTEM: 03_SPARQL.pdf: Página 18
•  Limitations 
•  Again, no assignment, creation of values 
•  How to concatenate first name and last name? 
 
•  No aggregation (e.g. COUNT, SUM, …): 
•  How to create a graph that has publication count per 
person for DBLP? 
•  No RDFS/OWL inference (so combining mappings in RDFS/
OWL with queries in SPARQL not possible) 
 
24 
Ontological Engineering Group. 
Constructing Graphs
speaker: SYSTEM
